title: Negotiate a Vendor Contract Renewal
description: The contract with the hotel's landscaping vendor is up for renewal, and the general manager wants to negotiate better terms.

tasks.description: Review the past year's spending and service quality with the current vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager has all relevant data on the vendor's performance.

tasks.description: Obtain quotes from two other competing vendors to use as leverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager has competitive quotes for comparison.

tasks.description: Meet with the current vendor to negotiate a lower price for the renewal, using the competitive quotes as leverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully negotiates a 10% price reduction for the new contract.
